documentation.simplegens.pink_gen_disabl: This gen is added specifically for the modpack Sky Factory 1 but can be enabled if desired.
guide.simplegens.modifiers.page.title: 強化
guide.simplegens.modifiers.button.title: 強化
guide.simplegens.combustion.page.title: Combustion Generators
guide.simplegens.combustion.button.title: Combustion Generators
guide.simplegens.combustion.description: Combustion generators burn combustible solid fuels to generate energy. These fuels can include furnace fuels and others.
guide.simplegens.culinary.page.title: Culinary Generators
guide.simplegens.culinary.button.title: Culinary Generators
guide.simplegens.culinary.description: Culinary Generators burn foods to generate energy. These fuels can include pretty much any food.
guide.simplegens.ender.page.title: Ender Generators
guide.simplegens.ender.button.title: Ender Generators
guide.simplegens.ender.description: The Ender Generators use ender based items to generate energy. These usually are items such as ender pearls or ender eyes.
guide.simplegens.nether.page.title: Nether Generators
guide.simplegens.nether.button.title: Nether Generators
guide.simplegens.nether.description: The Nether Generators use nether based items to generate energy. These usually are items such as nether stars ore blocks of nether stars.
guide.simplegens.geothermal.page.title: Geothermal Generators
guide.simplegens.geothermal.button.title: Geothermal Generators
guide.simplegens.geothermal.description: Geothermal Generators generate energy from hot fluids such as Lava.
guide.simplegens.fluid_combustion.descri: Fluid Combustion Generators generate energy from combustable fluids such as fuel or ethenol.
guide.simplegens.turbine.page.title: Turbine Generators
guide.simplegens.turbine.button.title: Turbine Generators
guide.simplegens.turbine.description: Turbine Generators require hot gasseous substances such as Steam to generate energy.
guide.simplegens.soul.page.title: Soul Generators
guide.simplegens.soul.button.title: Soul Generators
guide.simplegens.soul.description: Soul Generaters require items that have remnents of a mobs souls left behind. Usually these items are mob heads or other rare drops from mobs.
guide.simplegens.modifier_speed.desc: The speed modifier will increase the speed at which the generator runs. Use with caution as speed and consumption rates are increased equally.
guide.simplegens.modifier_efficiency: The Generator doesnt run any faster but it will use less fuel.
